entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Woodstock
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:40 a.m. ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 8.2Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Woodstock 2:00 PM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023
Temperature: 8.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.7 kPa falling
Humidity: 45 %
Dewpoint: -2.9°C
Wind: WNW 14 km/h gust 27 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: n/a

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers this afternoon. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High 9. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness in the afternoon then 30 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 6 or high. Forecast issued 11:00 AM ADT Tuesday 4 April 2023
